homepage.title: AI Answers
homepage.subtitle: Get answers to your Canada.ca questions.

intro.researchOnly: This proof of concept is for research purposes only. Work is ongoing.

about.title: About AI Answers
about.privacyNote: To protect your privacy, numbers and addresses will be removed before your question is sent to the AI service. The removed text will display as XXX.

aiServices.claude: AI service Claude: Anthropic Claude Sonnet 3.5, knowledge to April 2024
aiServices.chatgpt: AI service ChatGPT: OpenAI 4o, knowledge to May 2024
aiServices.cohere: AI service Cohere: Cohere Chat V2, knowledge to August 2024

about.contact: Development is still in progress - contact lisa.fast@cds-snc.ca for information.

feedback.surveyLink: Share your feedback (opens in new tab)
feedback.question: How was this answer?

privacy.title: Privacy and AI terms of use
privacy.storage: We may store your questions and answers to improve system performance. Personal information will be deleted and replaced with XXX. Personal information won't be stored.
privacy.disclaimer: Use the Canada.ca link provided in the response to check your answer. Responses generated by this AI system should not be considered as professional, legal, or medical advice. We attempt to ensure the accuracy of the information provided but there is a possibility that the information may contain inaccuracies, and the information may not yet reflect recent changes or fulfill your particular needs or purposes.
privacy.terms: This AI system relies on information provided on Government of Canada websites and your use of this system and any information generated is also subject to the

timeout.title: AI Answers has timed out.
timeout.message: Reload the page to try again.

errors.serviceUnavailable: AI Answers is unavailable until tomorrow due to reaching daily usage limits. Please check back then.

input.followUp: Ask a follow-on question or reply
input.hint: Hint: Add details to make your question clear and complete.
input.loadingHint: AI can make mistakes, always check your answer.

messages.thinkingWithContext: Deriving answer from search results and department.
messages.limitReached:
You've reached the limit of 3 questions per conversation.
Reload to start a new conversation.
messages.error: Sorry, we're having a problem connecting to the service right now. Please try again in a few minutes.
messages.blockedContent: Your question used words that aren't accepted. Please try asking it differently.
messages.blockedMessage: Your question was not sent to the AI service.
messages.privateContent: To protect your privacy, your question was not sent to the AI service. Please ask your question again without any personal details.
messages.privacyMessage: Your question contained personal details replaced with XXX.
messages.characterLimit: Your message is {count} {unit} too long. Please simplify your question.

citation.fallbackText: Unable to find a citation - use canada.ca search

expertRating.title: Answer rating
expertRating.hint: Rate each part of the answer

options.answerImprovement: How could the answer be improved (optional)?
options.betterCitation: Better canada.ca or gc.ca citation URL (optional):

errors.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid canada.ca or gc.ca URL

expertRating.intro: Rate the sentences in the answer, or the citation, or both

upload.intro: Select the AI service, language, and your CSV file. Use one you've downloaded and cleaned from the Feedback viewer.

items.context: Context Properties - optional - If left blank, the batch will first derive context, if provided it will use the provided context to retrieve answers

upload.adminCode: Enter Admin Code to enable file upload:

status.openaiWait: This may take up to a minute to start...
